doctors.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
doctors.about: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a highly experienced General Physician with expertise in preventive healthcare and chronic disease management. She has been practicing for over 15 years and is known for her patient-centric approach.

doctors.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
doctors.about: Dr. Rajesh Kumar specializes in internal medicine with a focus on complex medical conditions. He has extensive experience in managing chronic diseases and providing comprehensive healthcare solutions.

doctors.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
doctors.about: Dr. Priya Sharma is a dedicated General Physician known for her compassionate care and thorough approach to patient treatment. She specializes in preventive healthcare and family medicine.

doctors.name: Dr. Amit Patel
doctors.about: Dr. Amit Patel is a senior Internal Medicine specialist with extensive experience in managing complex medical conditions. He has special expertise in critical care and emergency medicine.

doctors.name: Dr. Meera Desai
doctors.about: Dr. Meera Desai is a General Physician with a special interest in preventive healthcare and lifestyle medicine. She focuses on providing personalized care to her patients.
